author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two persons were killed in as many accidents here.

A 30-year-old man died in a two-wheeler collision near Bargur on Thursday. The victim, Siva, an electrician, was heading for work on his two-wheeler along Bargur-Jegadevi road, when his vehicle collided with another two-wheeler. Siva died on the spot, while the other two-wheeler rider suffered grievous injuries and was rushed to Hosur government hospital.

In another accident, a 45-year-old farmer was fatally knocked down from his two-wheeler along Krishnagiri-Chennai highway on Thursday. He was hit by a mini-van from the rear and he died on the spot.
title: Two killed in accidents
